Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Tower Hotel in London (Wapping), you'll be minutes from Tower Bridge and Tower of London. This 4-star hotel is convenient to HMS Belfast.

Rooms
Stay in one of 801 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 5933 square feet (551.2 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Stay in one of 801 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at The Tower Hotel in London (Wapping), you'll be minutes from Tower Bridge and Tower of London. This 4-star hotel is convenient to HMS Belfast.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tower Bridge - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Tower of London - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
London City Hall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
HMS Belfast - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
The Shard - 1 km / 0.6 mi
London Bridge - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Gherkin - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Borough Market - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Royal Exchange - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Globe Theatre - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Tate Modern - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Museum of London - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Barbican Arts Centre - 2 km / 1.2 mi
London Stock Exchange - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 26.3 km / 16.4 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 39.5 km / 24.5 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 46.4 km / 28.8 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 48.5 km / 30.1 mi

The preferred airport for The Tower Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

- FROM LCY M25 EAST - JOIN THE A13 TO THE CITY. TURN LEFT ONTO TOWER BRIDGE AND TAKE THE SLIPWAY IMMEDIATELY ON THE LEFT - ST KATHARINE S WAY. THE HOTEL IS AT THE END OF THE ROAD ON THE LEFT.- FROM LHR M4 TO A4 INTO LONDON AND THEN FOLLOW SIGNS FOR CITY AND TOWER BRIDGE. DRIVE TOWARDS TOWER BRIDGE AS IF CROSSING TO SOUTH OF RIVER, STRAIGHT OVER FIRST SET OF LIGHTS AND TURN LEFT ONTO TOWER BRIDGE AND IMMEDIATELY TAKE THE SLIPWAY ON THE LEFT - ST KATHARINE S WAY AND THE HOTEL IS AT THE END. THERE ARE 120 CAR PARKING SPACES AVAILABLE UNDER THE HOTEL AT AN ADDITIONAL CHARGE.- FROM LGW M23 AND THEN A23 TO ELEPHANT AND CASTLE ROUNDABOUT. THEN FOLLOW SIGNS FOR TOWER BRIDGE A100.- FROM STN TAKE M11 UNTIL YOU MEET THE A13, AND THEN FOLLOW SIGNS TO CENTRAL LONDON UNTIL YOU REACH TOWER HILL..- DIRECTIONS FROM THE NORTH HEAD FOR SIGN POSTS TO THE CITY. ONCE IN CLOSE PROXIMITY TO THE CITY FOLLOW SIGNS FOR THE TOWER BRIDGE. DRIVE TOWARDS TOWER BRIDGE AS IF GOING TO SOUTH OF THE RIVER, BUT IMMEDIATELY TURN LEFT INTO THE SLIPWAY ST KATHARINE S WAY, AFTER GOING THROUGH THE TRAFFIC LIGHT CONTROLLED JUNCTION. DRIVE TO THE FOOT OF ST KATHARINE S WAY TOWARDS THE RIVER AND APPROACH THE HOTEL S CAR PARK BY BARRIER CONTROL..- DIRECTIONS FROM THE SOUTH HEAD FOR SIGN POSTS THE CITY AND THEN TOWER BRIDGE. CROSS TOWER BRIDGE, HOTEL WILL BE ON YOUR RIGHT. GO STRAIGHT OVER FIRST SET OF TRAFFIC LIGHTS. DO A COMPLETE U TURN AT 2ND SET OF TRAFFIC LIGHTS, AS IF DRIVING BACK OVER THE BRIDGE. PROCEED BACK THROUGH JUNCTION TRAFFIC LIGHTS, TAKING IMMEDIATE FIRST LEFT TURN INTO ST KATHARINE S WAY. HOTEL LOCATED AT THE END OF ST KATHARINE S WAY..

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
